Title: The Trial
Plot: Things are finally looking up for Earl with a GED, a job, a new apartment and love interest however it may all come crashing down during Joy's trial date. Earl's shocking testimony could help Joy but at what cost?
Writer: Vali Chandrasekaran, Mike Mariano, Timothy Stack
GuestStars: Louis T. Moyle, Timothy Stack, Abdoulaye N'Gom, Trey Carlisle, Chelcie Ross, Giovanni Ribisi, Marlee Matlin, Christine Taylor, Duane
